cs213.photoAlbum.control

Interface IPhotoController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhotoController

    public interface IPhotoController
    Controller interface for Photo management, such as adding/deleting tags, get photos by date range/tag.
    Author:
    dheeptha
